name: Dark Defender
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) whilst you control a face-up DARK monster. If this card is Special Summoned you can add 1 "Light Breather" from your Deck to your hand. If this card leaves the field for the Summon of a LIGHT or DARK monster: Target 1 of your banished DARK monsters; add it to your hand. You can only use 1 effect of "Dark Defender" per turn and only once that turn.
